channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Engineering Lifecycle Optimization
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Engineering Lifecycle Optimization

item.title: CVE-2021-20518|2024-09-17T00:06:10.547Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation Products are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 198437.

item.title: CVE-2021-20502|2024-09-17T04:13:44.074Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation Products are vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 198059.
